attributes.action: ban the wearing of religious symbols from schools and public offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The wearing of religious symbols is a private matter. If people choose a hobby such as a religon they should keep it to themselves and not be able to use schools or government offices to promote their hobby. In the same way as a swimmer is not allowed to walk around in a swimming costume or an angler can't go to school in wellies
